verses.verse: I am <S%H1875>sought<s%> of them that <S%H7592>asked<s%> not for me; I am <S%H4672>found<s%> of them that <S%H1245>sought<s%> me not: I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> me, <S%H2009>behold<s%> me, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that was not <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

I have <S%H6566>spread<s%> out my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> to a <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> which <S%H1980>walks<s%> in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that was not <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their own <S%H4284>thoughts;<s%>

A <S%H5971>people<s%> that provokes me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to my <S%H6440>face;<s%> that <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> in <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H6999>burns<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on altars of <S%H3843>brick;<s%>

Which <S%H3427>remain<s%> among the <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the <S%H5341>monuments,<s%> which <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2386>swine's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H6564>broth<s%> of <S%H6292>abominable<s%> things is in their <S%H3627>vessels;<s%>

Which <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7126>Stand<s%> by yourself, <S%H5066>come<s%> not <S%H5066>near<s%> to me; for I am <S%H6942>holier<s%> than you. <S%H428>These<s%> are a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> in my <S%H639>nose,<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H3344>burns<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: I will not keep <S%H2814>silence,<s%> but will <S%H7999>recompense,<s%> even <S%H7999>recompense<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> their <S%H2436>bosom,<s%>

Your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H2778>blasphemed<s%> me on the <S%H1389>hills:<s%> therefore will I <S%H4058>measure<s%> their <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6468>work<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> their <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> As the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H811>cluster,<s%> and one <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7843>Destroy<s%> it not; for a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> is in it: <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H5650>servants'<s%> <S%H4616>sakes,<s%> that I may not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> an <S%H3423>inheritor<s%> of my <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> and my <S%H972>elect<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it, and my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> shall be a <S%H5116>fold<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> a place for the <S%H1241>herds<s%> to <S%H7258>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in, for my <S%H5971>people<s%> that have <S%H1875>sought<s%> me.

But you are they that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> that <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> for that <S%H1409>troop,<s%> and that <S%H4390>furnish<s%> the <S%H4469>drink<s%> offering to that <S%H4507>number.<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H4487>number<s%> you to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and you shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter:<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> you did not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> when I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> you did not <S%H8085>hear;<s%> but <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> before my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> that <S%H834>wherein<s%> I <S%H2654>delighted<s%> not.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you shall be <S%H7456>hungry:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but you shall be <S%H6770>thirsty:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> but you shall be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H2898>joy<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but you shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> for <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and shall <S%H3213>howl<s%> for <S%H7667>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5117>leave<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for a <S%H7621>curse<s%> to my <S%H972>chosen:<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> you, and <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> by <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8034>name:<s%>

That he <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1288>blesses<s%> himself in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> and he that <S%H7650>swears<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H7911>forgotten,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H5641>hid<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

For, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> and the <S%H7223>former<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

But be you <S%H7797>glad<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%> in that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1254>create:<s%> for, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H1525>rejoicing,<s%> and her <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H4885>joy.<s%>

And I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7797>joy<s%> in my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in her, nor the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2201>crying.<s%>

There shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H5764>infant<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> nor an <S%H2205>old<s%> man that has not <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3117>days:<s%> for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old;<s%> but the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H7043>accursed.<s%>
And they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them.

They shall not <S%H1129>build,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3427>inhabit;<s%> they shall not <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat:<s%> for as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%> are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and my <S%H972>elect<s%> shall long <S%H1086>enjoy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

They shall not <S%H3021>labor<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> for <S%H928>trouble;<s%> for they are the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> with them.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H7121>call,<s%> I will <S%H6030>answer;<s%> and while they are <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> I will <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> and the <S%H2924>lamb<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H259>together,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>bullock:<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall be the <S%H5175>serpent's<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%> They shall not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
